self.philbrown.javaQuery
Class Callbacks

java.lang.Object
  self.philbrown.javaQuery.Callbacks

public class Callbacks
extends java.lang.Object

A multi-purpose callbacks list object that provides a powerful way to manage callback lists.

Author:
Phil Brown
